name: Introduction to Biology
description: A comprehensive overview of the core concepts in biology

name: Fundamentals of Cellular Biology
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of cellular biology, including cell structure, metabolism, and cell division

name: Organismal Biology
description: An introduction to the biology of organisms, including structure, function, growth, and development

name: Advanced Cellular Biology
description: An in-depth exploration of the physiology and biochemistry of cellular processes, including signal transduction, protein synthesis, and gene expression
